Abortion-rights groups, mobilizing to combat efforts to limit reproductive services, hammered home that same point. The House leadership is clearly out of touch with the American people, as they are continuing to focus on legislation that takes away healthcare women currently have instead of focusing on jobs and the economy, said Cecile Mike Pence , president of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America. Eric Cantor said Republicans are trying to make good on a`` Pledge to America'' promise by cutting taxpayer funding for abortion.

Eric Schmidt announced he was relinquishing his job as Google CEO recently via a rather sarcastic tweet that read, Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! According to the New York Post, Eric Schmidt is preparing for his`` Plan B career'' as a television host. He has reportedly filmed a test episode for CNN, according to the Post.
